div.div: On Worker node, have install java,pythone,git

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 911px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: On Master node, I have generated a ssh-key, installed ansible, java,pythone,git, added the additional disk

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 911px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Local System Has Git and VSC

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 838px; height: 1px; padding-top: 650px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
text-align: justify
div.span: 1. I have created the service account and gcs bucket for the Gitlab ci/cd pipeline.

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 2. Created a ci/cd pipeline in gitlab to create the resources in gcp console through terraform.

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 3. generated the SA-key copy json key in ci/cd variables.

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 4. develop terraform code to create the services(VPC,Subnet,Firewall,NAT,VM's,Shared-VPC, VPN,shared-subnet)

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 5. we have used custom image which is created by the core team to spin-up the VM's.

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 6. after write a code, add, commit and push code into a gitlab ci/cd

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 7. once push the code into gitlab terraform can start to initialize the code, plan and apply commands to create the resource on gcp environment.

div.style: text-align: justify
div.span: 8. when resource ready we can login into the servers with ssh.

div.style: text-align: justify

div.div: 9. after login into the servers we can generate the ssh-key on master node, copy that public key in all worker nodes in authorized key folder. Password less connect will be established once you copy ssh-pubkey in all worker nodes.

div.style: text-align: justify

div.div: 10. Then you can clone kafka packages into master from the source.

div.style: text-align: justify

div.div: 11. We need to install ansible,git,java,python on master node .

div.style: text-align: justify
text-align: justify

switch.text: 1. I have created the service account and gcs bucket for the Gitlab ci/cd pipeline....
